item.title: Multiple potholes and failed repairs, 9th May
item.description:
The worst is where Iâ€™ve highlighted, just before the turn to the Star College. The road from the new roundabout to the Star College is dangerous to cycle, the road is in very poor repair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Multiple pot holes, 9th May
item.description:
Multiple pot holes, VERY Rough Problem has been there since the work to the road was done ages ago. Drove over it today and now my car steers to the left. Needs ripping up and re-doing. This has only gotten worse. In between A40 and M5 turn off Gloucester bound carriage
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Highway tree roots in private property. Tree branches continually breaking damaging cars., 9th May
item.description:
Tree between 19 and 21 the Grove, off Hales Road, Cheltenham. Roots visible in garden of 19 the Grove potentially causing foundation issues. Also tree branches continuously braking and falling on to parked cars causing dents etc..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, The Grove, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Horse tethered at entrance to bridleway, 9th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cursey Lane, Elmstone Hardwicke, Tewkesbury
